sorting_parameters.name: num_pca_features
sorting_parameters.documentation: The number of PCA features to use in clustering.

sorting_parameters.name: interpolation
sorting_parameters.documentation: Should we use interpolation? (>1) If so, by how many times should we increase the sampling resolution using interpolation?.

sorting_parameters.name: min_clusters
sorting_parameters.documentation: How many clusters should we find at a minimum?

sorting_parameters.name: max_clusters
sorting_parameters.documentation: How many clusters should we find at maximum?

sorting_parameters.name: num_start
sorting_parameters.documentation: How many random starting locations should we start searching from?
